commentary: Mustafizur Rahman to MDK Perera, OUT Mushfiq effects another direct hit, this time he under-arms it onto the striker's end. Dilruwan premeditates by venturing a long way across the off stump. Mustafiz pushes a yorker wide past him. Dilruwan misses it and searches for a bye. He can't get back in time. The ball might have brushed the pad. Mushfiq swoops down on the ball and boom! He has had a great day with the big gloves

commentary: Taskin Ahmed to Pradeep, OUT Taskin does it. He does a Steve Finn or a Shane Bond. He claims a last-over hat-trick, pulls off a spread-eagled celebration, and sets off on a sprint.
